headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin to create occupancy sensors with connected activation switches and delayed timeouts.
footerDisplay: Note: If you change the name of a switch, it will create a new accessory in HomeKit.

name.title: Occupancy sensor name
name.description: This is used as the display name of the occupancy sensor in HomeKit.

delay.title: Delay Timeout
delay.description: In seconds, how long to wait after all activation switches are off before the sensor will stop detecting occupancy. Max 3600 seconds, or 1 hour.

log_trigger.title: Log triggering switch?
log_trigger.description: When the sensor is activated, the name of the triggering switch is included in the log

log_delay_time.title: Log delay time?
log_delay_time.description: When the sensor is activated, the occupancy delay timeout included in the log

switches.title: Activation switches
switches.description: Add one or more activation switches for this occupancy sensor.

items.title: Friendly name
items.description: This is used as the display name for the switch accessory in HomeKit.
